::Magmatron/Four Nightmares/Dachande/Battera::

    "Troops," He spoke into=
 his comm. "We are going to help the Council again. But, we are not going t=
o sacrifice ourselves in doing so. Go to the antartic, and fight against Me=
gatron. But if the battle turns and we start to lose, leave, let the Counci=
l deal with a losing battle."
    The Four Nightmares trasformed to Beast M=
ode, left the base and headed towards Antartica. Dachande and Battera had j=
ust reached the location of Vulois, and he wasn't answering, but still they=
 waited.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: kinger01030@... 
  To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2000 12:49 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: Death's attempt


  Death flew out the door. He pulled his reaper out =
and his eyes went to 
  complete darkness. He put his thrusters on full and=
 blasted towards the 
  anarctic.

        eGroups Sponsor
